name: Modern War Duty Ops 3D
description:
Modern War Duty Ops 3D is nothing but combat commando army fight for our military force and you are a real fearless fighter in military battle. Our military force have failed in commando missions and proved our army training very bad but as a brave fearless fighter and our best army commando missions warrior you have to fight for our army survival.
Feature ***
*** best shooting game
*** top action games sounds
*** army shooter simulator controls
*** army games free 3d real mission
*** army shooting games 3d graphics
*** commando mission game regions with best commando games sounds
*** commando adventure shooter levels
